text: where are you getting stuck with them?

Hi Melinda! On the Academy Practicum it asks for a Repeater Module with a grid image format that stays within 2 columns. I'm running into issues for the CSS styling and can't get it to format properly.
So you're having trouble turning the four columns in to two when you resize the window?
<@U01DG96K18T> correct along with getting the grid to properly show

Design it like rows and columns. The columns would change their widths. I would check out CSS Media Queries. <https://www.w3schools.com/cssref/css3_pr_mediaquery.asp|https://www.w3schools.com/cssref/css3_pr_mediaquery.asp> You can adjust the width of a column based on the screen width with these.
